description: CloudControllerManagerConfiguration contains elements describing cloud-controller manager.

Generic.description: Generic holds configuration for a generic controller-manager

KubeCloudShared.description: KubeCloudSharedConfiguration holds configuration for shared related features both in cloud controller manager and kube-controller manager.

NodeController.description: NodeController holds configuration for node controller related features.

NodeStatusUpdateFrequency.description: NodeStatusUpdateFrequency is the frequency at which the controller updates nodes' status

ServiceController.description: ServiceControllerConfiguration holds configuration for ServiceController related features.

Webhook.description: Webhook is the configuration for cloud-controller-manager hosted webhooks
